frontMatter.title: Lesson 2 - Voice-to-Action with OpenAI Whisper
frontMatter.description: Using OpenAI Whisper for voice command processing in humanoid robots
learning_objectives: Configure OpenAI Whisper for robotic voice command processing
Implement speech-to-text pipelines for robot control
Integrate voice processing with ROS 2 systems
Optimize voice processing for real-time robotic applications
